abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column pays tribute to celebrated goalie Martin Brodeur, who is retiring; observes that Brodeur has secured a place in New York sports lore, despite playing the majority of his career for the New Jersey Devils.
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur, who retired Thursday after a brief stint with the Blues, earned a spot alongside other New York sports icons despite playing across the Hudson River for the Devils.
snippet: Martin Brodeur, who retired Thursday after a brief stint with the Blues, earned a spot alongside other New York sports icons despite playing across the Hudson River for the Devils.

headline.main: A New York Icon Who Shone Just Outside the Bright Lights
headline.seo: Martin Brodeur: A New Jersey Devil and New York Icon
headline.print_headline: A New York Icon Who Shone Just Outside the Bright Lights
